evidence.text: Person B: Luckily, Pimpão had his dad's BBA card.
Person B: Go talk to your dad. He was worried.
Person B: I've already made up my mind, Mom.
Person B: I can take care of myself, Mom.
Person A: All right. Take care of my coat, then, I'll want it back.

Person B: Mom, I have to tell you something.
Person B: Your jacket... I left it with Helena. She begged me so long I just couldn't say no. 
Person A: That's all right, it'd been stored away for so long. Helena will make better use of it in London.
Person B: Are you all right? 
Person A: Sure I am, honey. How about you?

Person A: I wish I could've made a welcome- home soufflé, honey, but there was no time. 
Person A: Not hungry?
Person B: I think it'll take a few days for me to get over the time difference.
